_description: William Dunbar, On the Nativity — seven aureate 8-line stanzas with refrain, ‘Et nobis puer natus est’

Banna.First Lines:
Rorate celi desuperHevins distill ȝour balmy
                    schouris…
Banna.Last Lines:
…He þat is crownit aboue þe skyPro nobis puer
                        natus est
